history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00061
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING A FRAMEWORK FOR THE RIGHT TO ADEQUATE FOOD, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : Right To Adequate Food Framework Act Of 2016
ABSTRACT : Seeks to clarify the right, establish standards for compliance, lay down principles to shape the process of realization, and prohibit violations of the right to adequate food by establishing a comprehensive law that will harmonize all laws related to Filipino’s right to adequate food.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : NOGRALES, KARLO ALEXEI B., NOGRALES, JERICHO JONAS B.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
